TopicTitle: Does Duna Have Ice on it's Poles?

Articles.Content:
I tried to land and get a surface sample but my parachute failed somehow and just let the craft plummet into the ground. Shame too, I was looking forward to seeing this. I figured i would've gotten alot of science from it, And just the thought of knowing i was looking forward to it.

But the curiosity of the kerbal race caused poor old Jebediah to die... I did a munar landing and planted a flag for him

But whoever has or knows can you tell me if it does?

Edited January 10, 2014 by ThatKerbal
I think we can clearly see that it has ice on its poles. If you're asking if the poles count as a separate biome...no they do not. That is because the biomes for Duna have not been released yet.
Oh okay, Thanks i wasn't sure because with KSP some things can mean a number of things
